name: Space Trial
description:
WARNING: this game was design for phone at first, the web version isn't the full experience wanted !

Here my entry for the LD jam 45 on the theme of "Start with nothing". Embody a space musketeer in a casual deckbuilding game where you start with a single sword move to finish with many others.

Swipe your cards to attack, each card can have 3 different uses on each of the 3 swipes: right, top and down.

You can also swipe left to protect yourself.

for the web version, use directionnal arrows instead of swiping.

enjoy !
